Looks like good quality. Has English and Italian audio tracks in Stereo and 6 Channel. Has Italian subtitles but not the English subs. Overall pretty good. Thanks! The Blu-Ray of Zombie is coming out in a couple days, see if you can upload that marainos. Thank You

Well this does have an English Sub but for some reason it doesn't show in any of my Players and I cant access it. Also, the English 2.0 Stereo audio cuts out in a bunch of places for seconds at a time. The 6-channel seems fine. Thanks
